article:
Nick is a middle school student. He studies hard, _ he is very naughty  , too. In summer holidays, he often plays with other friends in the park. The park is near his house. One day he _ some new clothes as his birthday present. He felt very _ .
"Mum, can I go cycling  with my friends? I want them to _ my new clothes," asked Nick. "Yes, please keep your clothes _ ," said Mother. She was doing some cooking. "We'll _ supper after you come back." Two hours later, Nick went home _ supper.
"Why are your clothes so _ ?" asked his mother.
"I'm sorry, Mum," _ Nick. "I had no time to take off my clothes when I fell off the bike."
